title: Man charged with poisoning death of Adrian Murphy
text:
A 24-year-old man has been charged with poisoning in connection with the death of a man in south-west London.

Adrian Murphy, 43, was found dead on June 4 at a block of flats in Lombard Road, Battersea.

Scotland Yard say they are awaiting tests to confirm a cause of death.

Officers linked the death to an incident in Walthamstow, north-east London, on May 30, when a 40-year-old man was found unconscious.

He was taken to hospital and later discharged.

Police had suspected the two victims had been targeted via gay dating app Grindr and had asked any men who may have been attacked in similar circumstances to come forward.
description: A 24-year-old man has been charged with poisoning in connection with the death of a man in south-west London.
